summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MoltBot LLM provider reliability features. All 9 test cases passed successfully, verifying proper implementation of defaults, configuration functions, provider handlers, server integration, documentation, and JSON validity.
passed_tests: llm-config.ts exports getLLMConfig, isProviderConfigured, formatProviderError functions
providers.ts exports providersHandlers with providers.status and providers.test methods
server-methods-list.ts includes providers.status and providers.test in BASE_METHODS
docker/moltbot.json has valid JSON with groq/openrouter/ollama provider configs
docs/DEPLOY_COOLIFY.md exists and documents all required env vars
env.example has all new env vars documented
